_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: tModLoader ARM
author: parker@parkervcp.com
description:
tModLoader modified by Ashu.
Version: 1.9.1
Check for updates: https://github.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Vanilla tModloader Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
## install packages to get version and download links
apt update
apt install -y curl p7zip-full wget jq file


GITHUB_PACKAGE=Dradonhunter11/tModLoader64bit


## get release info and download links
LATEST_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/$GITHUB_PACKAGE/releases" | jq -c '.[]' | head -1)
RELEASES=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/$GITHUB_PACKAGE/releases" | jq '.[]')

if [ -z "$VERSION" ] || [ "$VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
    echo -e "defaulting to latest release"
    DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo $LATEST_JSON | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i Linux)
else
    VERSION_CHECK=$(echo $RELEASES | jq -r --arg VERSION "$VERSION" '. | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .tag_name')
    if [ "$VERSION" == "$VERSION_CHECK" ]; then
        if [[ "$VERSION" == v0* ]]; then
            echo -e "Try 1"
            DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo $RELEASES | jq -r --arg VERSION "$VERSION" '. | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i Linux)
        else
            echo -e "Try 2"
            DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo $RELEASES | jq -r --arg VERSION "$VERSION" '. | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i tModLoader | grep -v -i vulkan | grep -v -i Windows)
        fi
        
    else         
    echo -e "Incorrect version, downloading the latest."
    DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo $LATEST_JSON | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i Linux)
    fi
fi



## mkdir and cd to /mnt/server/
mkdir -p /mnt/server

cd /mnt/server
mkdir Mods
rm -rf /mnt/server/.local/share/Terraria/ModLoader/Mods

## download release

if [ "-e -i tMod*.exe" ] 
then
    echo -e "Removing old files"
    rm -rf *
else
    echo -e "Skipping file removal, first installation"
fi


echo -e "Executando 'curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} -o ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}'" 
curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} -o ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}

    echo -e "Decompressing files"
    7z e ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/} -y

echo -e "Cleaning up useless files..."
rm -rf ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}
echo -e "Complete Installation"

variables.name: World Name
variables.description: The name for the world file.

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: The maximum number of players a server will hold.

variables.name: World Size
variables.description: Creates a world if none is found in the path specified by -world. World size is specified by: 1 (small), 2 (medium), 3 (large) 4(Extra-Large?).

variables.name: Difficulty
variables.description: Sets the difficulty of the world when using autocreate 0(normal), 1(expert) 2(Extra-Expert?).

variables.name: Secure
variables.description: Adds addition cheat protection to the server. (can lead to unjust bans)

variables.name: MOTD
variables.description: Message of the Day for the server
variables.default_value: Please don’t cut the purple trees!

variables.name: Server Password
variables.description: Server password for users to connect to your server
